include/shared/gport.h

00018  * File:        gport.h
00019  * Details:     This file defines common error codes to be shared
00020  *                              between API layers.
00021  *
00022  *             Its contents are not used directly by applications;
00023  *             it is used only by header files of parent APIs which
00024  *             need to define error codes.
00025  *********************************************************************/
00026 
00027 #ifndef _SHR_GPORT_H
00028 #define _SHR_GPORT_H
00029 
00030 /*
00031  * Defines:
00032  *     _SHR_GPORT_*
00033  * Purpose:
00034  *     GPORT (Generic port) definitions. GPORT can be used to specify
00035  *     a {module, port} pair, trunk, and other port types.
00036  */
00037 
00038 #define _SHR_GPORT_NONE             (0)
00039 #define _SHR_GPORT_INVALID         (-1)
00040 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_LOCAL               1  /* Port on local unit     */
00041 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_MODPORT             2  /* Module ID and port     */
00042 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_TRUNK               3  /* Trunk ID               */
00043 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_LOCAL_CPU           5  /* CPU destination        */
00044 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP   9  /* Queue Group            */
00045 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_MCAST              11  /* Multicast Set          */
00046 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_MCAST_QUEUE_GROUP  12  /* Multicast Queue Group  */
00047 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SCHEDULER          13  /* Scheduler              */
00048 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_CHILD              20  /* Child port             */
00049 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_EGRESS_GROUP       21  /* Egress group port      */
00050 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_EGRESS_CHILD       22  /* Egress child port      */
00051 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_EGRESS_MODPORT     23  /* Egress Mod and port    */
00052 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_UCAST_SUBSCRIBER_QUEUE_GROUP  24  /* Local Queue Group */
00053 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_MCAST_SUBSCRIBER_QUEUE_GROUP  25  /* Local Multicast Queue Group  */
00054 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_COSQ               30  /* cosq gport */
00055 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_PROFILE            40
00056 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_DESTMOD_QUEUE_GROUP      41 /* DMVOQ gport */
00057 
00058 #define _SHR_COSQ_GPORT_COMMON_CORE_BITS 3
00059 #define _SHR_COSQ_GPORT_COMMON_CORE_MASK ((1 << _SHR_COSQ_GPORT_COMMON_CORE_BITS) - 1)
00060 #define _SHR_COSQ_GPORT_COMMON_ALL_CORES_VALUE _SHR_COSQ_GPORT_COMMON_CORE_MASK
00061 
00062 #define _SHR_CORE_ALL -17
00063 #define _SHR_CORE_FIELD2ID(field) ((field) != _SHR_COSQ_GPORT_COMMON_ALL_CORES_VALUE ? field : _SHR_CORE_ALL)
00064 #define _SHR_CORE_ID2FIELD(id) ((id) != _SHR_CORE_ALL ? id : _SHR_COSQ_GPORT_COMMON_ALL_CORES_VALUE)
00065 
00066 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT                           26
00067 #define _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_MASK                            0x3f
00068 
00069 #define _SHR_GPORT_MODID_SHIFT                          11
00070 #define _SHR_GPORT_MODID_MASK                           0x7fff
00071 #define _SHR_GPORT_PORT_SHIFT                           0
00072 #define _SHR_GPORT_PORT_MASK                            0x7ff
00073 #define _SHR_GPORT_TRUNK_SHIFT                          0
00074 #define _SHR_GPORT_TRUNK_MASK                           0x3ffffff
00075 #define _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_SHIFT              0
00076 #define _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_MASK               0x3ffffff
00077 #define _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_QID_SHIFT          0
00078 #define _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_QID_MASK           0x3fff
00079 #define _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_SYSPORTID_SHIFT    14
00080 #define _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_SYSPORTID_MASK     0xfff
00081 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_SHIFT                      0
00082 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_MASK                       0x7fffff
00083 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_CORE_SHIFT                 23
00084 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_CORE_MASK                  _SHR_COSQ_GPORT_COMMON_CORE_MASK
00085 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_NODE_SHIFT                 0
00086 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_NODE_MASK                  0xfffff
00087 
00088 #define _SHR_GPORT_IS_MODPORT(_gport)    \
00089         (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT) == _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_MODPORT)
00090 
00091 #define _SHR_GPORT_MODPORT_SET(_gport, _module, _port)                       \
00092         ((_gport) = (_SHR_GPORT_TYPE_MODPORT   << _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT)   | \
00093          (((_module) & _SHR_GPORT_MODID_MASK)  << _SHR_GPORT_MODID_SHIFT)  | \
00094          (((_port) & _SHR_GPORT_PORT_MASK)     << _SHR_GPORT_PORT_SHIFT))
00095 
00096 #define _SHR_GPORT_MODPORT_MODID_GET(_gport)    \
00097         (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_MODID_SHIFT) & _SHR_GPORT_MODID_MASK)
00098 
00099 #define _SHR_GPORT_MODPORT_PORT_GET(_gport)     \
00100         (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_PORT_SHIFT) & _SHR_GPORT_PORT_MASK)
00101 
00102 #define _SHR_GPORT_IS_TRUNK(_gport)    \
00103         (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT) == _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_TRUNK)
00104 
00105 #define _SHR_GPORT_TRUNK_SET(_gport, _trunk_id)                              \
00106         ((_gport) = (_SHR_GPORT_TYPE_TRUNK      << _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT)  | \
00107          (((_trunk_id) & _SHR_GPORT_TRUNK_MASK) << _SHR_GPORT_TRUNK_SHIFT))
00108 
00109 #define _SHR_GPORT_TRUNK_GET(_gport)   \
00110         (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_TRUNK_SHIFT) & _SHR_GPORT_TRUNK_MASK)
00111 
00112 #define _SHR_GPORT_IS_SCHEDULER(_gport)    \
00113         (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT) == _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SCHEDULER)
00114 
00115 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_SET(_gport, _id)                            \
00116          _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_CORE_SET(_gport, _id, _SHR_CORE_ALL)
00117 
00118 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_GET(_gport)   \
00119          (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_SHIFT) & _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_MASK)
00120 
00121 #define _SHR_GPORT_LOCAL_CPU        \
00122         (_SHR_GPORT_TYPE_LOCAL_CPU << _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT)
00123 
00124 #define _SHR_GPORT_IS_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP(_gport)    \
00125         (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT) == _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP)
00126 
00127 #define _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_SET(_gport, _qid)                           \
00128              _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_SYSQID_SET(_gport,                      \
00129              _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_SYSPORTID_MASK, \
00130               _qid)
00131 
00132 #define _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_SYSQID_SET(_gport, _sysport_id, _qid)                       \
00133         ((_gport) = (_SHR_GPORT_TYPE_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP << _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT)   | \
00134          (((_sysport_id) & _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_SYSPORTID_MASK)  << _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_SYSPORTID_SHIFT)  | \
00135          (((_qid) & _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_QID_MASK)     << _SHR_GPORT_UCAST_QUEUE_GROUP_QID_SHIFT))
00136 
00137 #define _SHR_GPORT_IS_MCAST_QUEUE_GROUP(_gport) \
00138         (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT) == _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_MCAST_QUEUE_GROUP)
00139 
00140 #define _SHR_GPORT_IS_COSQ(_gport) \
00141         (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT) == _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_COSQ)
00142 
00143 #define  _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_CORE_GET(_gport) \
00144         _SHR_CORE_FIELD2ID((((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_CORE_SHIFT) & _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_CORE_MASK))
00145 
00146 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_CORE_SET(_gport, _scheduler_id, _core_id)       \
00147         ((_gport) = (_SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SCHEDULER << _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT)  | \
00148         (((_scheduler_id) & _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_MASK) << _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_SHIFT) | \
00149         (((_SHR_CORE_ID2FIELD(_core_id)) & _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_CORE_MASK) << _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_CORE_SHIFT))
00150 
00151 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_NODE_SET(_gport, _level, _node)    \
00152          ((_gport) = (_SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SCHEDULER << _SHR_GPORT_TYPE_SHIFT)  | \
00153           (((_level) & _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_LEVEL_MASK) << _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_LEVEL_SHIFT) | \
00154           (((_node) & _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_NODE_MASK) << _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_NODE_SHIFT))
00155 
00156 #define _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_NODE_GET(_gport)   \
00157          (((_gport) >> _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_NODE_SHIFT) & _SHR_GPORT_SCHEDULER_NODE_MASK)
00158 
00159 #endif  /* !_SHR_GPORT_H */
